title: Ticket #3840: condor_submit -spool test
description:
Ensure that the -spool option to condor submit works.

The event which trigered this test was an issue getting the executable spooled to windows. We do a series of edge cases listed below:

  1. a job starts to run at all
  2. a job starts to run and completes
  3. a job with return files runs and completes. Yet the data files are not available until a condor_fetch_data is executed
  4. a job with an input file runs and completes.
  5. a job runs and completes and the input file becomes a verified content output file
  6. same as above except after we spool the job via condor_submit -spool, we trash the input file and still verify the expected output.
